original_text: Then he took his oldest son who was to reign in his place and offered him for a burnt offering on the wall. And there came great wrath against Israel. And they withdrew from him and returned to their own land.
korean_text: 이에 자기 왕위를 이어 왕이 될 맏아들을 데려와 성 위에서 번제를 드린지라 이스라엘에게 크게 격노함이 임하매 그들이 떠나 각기 고국으로 돌아갔더라

sentences.original_text: Then he took his oldest son
who was to reign in his place
and offered him for a burnt offering on the wall
And there came great wrath against Israel
and returned to their own land
